Row.Text: In this multiplayer scenario, you need to survive the other factions who are fighting for space on the last colony ship, as well as the planet itself. Rounds typically last from 20-45 minutes depending on the game size.

Our leaders have failed us. The Red Death comes for us all. Our old civilization could not stand the test of time. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Our only hope lies in a single colony ship waiting in orbit for the last survivors of this world. We can remotely pilot the lander, but the other factions are jamming our signal. The only way we will survive is for us to eliminate the other factions.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Welcome to the last civilization of this world.
